# Overview

The following is an overview of a series of hierarchical clustering analyses for the East Asian monolingual group. 
First, categorizations were standardized and a differences measure in euclidean distance was computed. 
The clusters were determined usingthe Ward d2 algorithm in a stepwise fashion. 

```{r}
knitr::include_graphics(here("docs", "figs", "e_asian_check.png"))
```

## 2 Clusters
```{r fig.width=14, fig.height=10}
ggarrange(plot_clusters(e_asian, clusters = 2),
          plot_clusters2(e_asian, clusters = 2)) + ggtitle("East Asian monolingual 2 clusters")
```
